body.name: Solar Charger for Ring Doorbell,5W Ring Solar Charger,IP65 Waterproof Ring Doorbell Solar Panel Compatible with Ring Video Doorbell 2,Video Doorbell 3/3+ /4 &Video Doorbell 4
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 14 hrs 37 mins
features: Compatible with:The Ring doorbell solar charger Compatible with ring video doorbell 2,video doorbell 3/3+/4 & video doorbell 4. Do not compatible with doorbell Wire,video doorbell Pro.Please confirm the model of your camera before place an order.

Away From Doorbell Low Battery Warning:The Ring doorbell 3 solar charger can convert solar energy to electrical energy,365Days No-stop Supply power for your doorbell. Your doorbell will not have low battery warning again.

Save Money and Time:First of all,the ring solar charger for doorbell can help you do not have to replace the battery for your doorbell and save your money.Secondly, our solar panels for ring doorbell can save the time replacing battery and eliminate the hassle of battery replacement.

21% Higher Conversion Efficiency:Our ring doorbell solar panel charger is made of monocrystalline silicon,the charging efficiency of monocrystalline silicon is higher than others.Even on cloudy days, it can continuously charge your camera and keep your camera operating.
IP65 Waterproof:The ring doorbell 2 solar charger is IP65 waterproof could withstand all the weather including rain, snow, thunderstorm.The working temperature range is -4℉ to 122℉.

10pcs cable clips: Our ring doorbell with solar charger included 10pcs cable clips,the charge cable of the doorbell solar panel can be fixed on the wall,make the doorbell and solar charger looks beautiful and tidy.
Easy to install:Please install the bracket according to the steps shown in the description.then Punch two holes in the wall,mount your solar panel and connect the charging cable to your camera.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars IS NOT COMPATABLE with my RING front door bell/ camera

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: No need to worry about charging

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Above & Beyond Expectations.
reviews.reviewText: I must admit I was very skeptical at first about this Ring video doorbell solar charger. A lot of solar chargers take a long, long time to charge your devices. After I received this one from Amazon yesterday afternoon, I immediately set it up with my Ring doorbell (hence the less-than-professional-quality of the installation as you can see from the picture) just so I can find out how long it will take it to recharge it. My Ring dashboard informed me that my doorbell was at 20% capacity at that time. This afternoon, 24 hours later, and to my complete surprise, it’s at 100% capacity! Need I say more? True, Southern California’s August weather may have something to do with it. In any case, I have to take my hat off to this extremely competent Ring doorbell solar charger.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Didn't work for me
reviews.reviewText: I live in an area that has lots of sunshine nearly every day of the year. My Ring doorbell initially held a charge but eventually it wasn't able to maintain it for long periods, so I thought this would be a great idea. Unfortunately, it didn't charge the Ring. I tried another solar charger, also from Amazon, but it still doesn't hold the charge any longer than it did before, so I continue to remove the battery to recharge it. This worked the same as another similar, but more expensive model, so I can't say it is any worse than others on the market. My husband hated the way this looked, so we took it down.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Waste of money

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This work perfect with my ring doorbell. Easy to install.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars This does NOT charge your Ring doorbell
reviews.reviewText: First, installation was fast and easy and the little wire holder push pin type things make the wire run look incredibly nice. There's also plenty of wire to run the solar panel to a nice location for max sun. I ended up purchasing a gutter clamp since my gutters hang too far over for the panel to receive more than half a days worth of sun and that worked perfectly. However, this does NOT charge your ring doorbell. I don't know what everyone else is talking about but you're connecting the panel to where the ring would be hardwired with the terminals, not at the micro USB charging port. There's even a little tag under the terminal points that says "24VAC only;" a solar panel only outputs DC. When I finally installed the panel, my app shows the little green "charging" battery symbol with the lightning bolt but, if you look under "Device Health," it says "hardwired," and my battery percentage is still slowly ticking down. Worst part is I can't find a solar panel that utilizes a micro USB small enough to properly fit behind the camera.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I unfortunately missed my return window being away on my honeymoon which sucks because this product doesn’t work! It won’t even register with my ring doorbell and I verified it was the right model for the panel. Don’t buy.
